name: Not to apply to army, air force, navy, national guard, or police activities league
text: This chapter shall not apply to any boxing contest held as a recreational activity by army, air force, navy, or national guard personnel, or the police activities league, when the contest is held under the supervision of a recreational officer of the army, air force, navy, or national guard, or a police activities league staff member. [L 1935, c 43, §1; RL 1945, §7586; am L 1949, c 264, §15; RL 1955, §165-37; am L 1959, c 155, §3; HRS ; am L 1983, c 241, §27; am L 1998, c 58, §1; am L 2004, c 135, §23]
